code: import dayjs from'dayjs';export function unixToDate(unix){var format=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'YYYY-MM-DD';return dayjs.unix(unix).utc().format(format);}export var formatTime=function formatTime(unix,buffer){var now=dayjs();var timestamp=dayjs.unix(parseInt(unix)).add(buffer!==null&&buffer!==void 0?buffer:0,'minute');var inSeconds=now.diff(timestamp,'second');var inMinutes=now.diff(timestamp,'minute');var inHours=now.diff(timestamp,'hour');var inDays=now.diff(timestamp,'day');if(inMinutes<1){return'recently';}if(inHours>=24){return"".concat(inDays," ").concat(inDays===1?'day':'days'," ago");}else if(inMinutes>=60){return"".concat(inHours," ").concat(inHours===1?'hour':'hours'," ago");}else if(inSeconds>=60){return"".concat(inMinutes," ").concat(inMinutes===1?'minute':'minutes'," ago");}else{return"".concat(inSeconds," ").concat(inSeconds===1?'second':'seconds'," ago");}};
